title: How to Draw and Shade with Pencils

media:group.media:title: How to Draw and Shade with Pencils
media:group.media:description:
Get the resources: http://bradsartschool.com

Shading with pencils is a lot of fun and once you get the hang of it isn't as hard as it looks. In this video we talk about drawing with a pencil, different types and lead hardness and how to get a nice pencil gradient when shading. 

What I used in this video (these are Amazon affiliate links)
Sketchbook: https://amzn.to/3FaAe4S
Mechanical pencil: https://amzn.to/3oxzIId
Pencil leads (b, hb, h): https://amzn.to/3Bdwc9s
4b leads: https://amzn.to/3FkXBss
4h leads: https://amzn.to/3iyKHNN
Pencil sharpener: https://amzn.to/3AcCSmS
Gum (Kneaded) eraser: https://amzn.to/3Bav72o
Eraser: https://amzn.to/3izQoLo
